resources.string:
Send LogCat and AppLog to developers by e-mail
 1. Please check the contents by pressing the LogCat display button and AppLog display button (Please select the application when the application selection screen for displaying the text file is displayed)
 2. After confirming the contents to be sent, press the send button and select E-Mail in the E-Mail selection dialog
 3. Please enter a message in the body of E - Mail if necessary and send an E - Mail. (The log is compressed to zip and it is attached file)
